name: .AB3 File Extension
summary: Learn about .AB3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an AB3 file with versions 3 and above of Ulead PhotoImpact (Windows). However, PhotoImpact is discontinued. Thus, if you do not already have access to PhotoImpact, you likely will not be able to open your AB3 file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
